attributes.action: vulnerable people should have the right for self isolation now
attributes.additional_details: Protect people from dying and collapsing the NHS!
attributes.background: Give the order to companies to allow the vulnerable groups (elderly/people with Asthma, heart problems, etc ) to work from home and ideally to isolate themselves and this needs to happen ASAP.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has updated their advice social distancing, particularly for the elderly or those with health conditions: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/covid-19-guidance-on-social-distancing-and-for-vulnerable-people/guidance-on-social-distancing-for-everyone-in-the-uk-and-protecting-older-people-and-vulnerable-adults

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
